titles.title: Be all at rest, my soul

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: “Be all at rest, my soul!” Oh! blessed secret Of the true life that glorifies thy Lord; Not always doth the busiest soul best serve Him, But he who resteth on His faithful word.

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: “Be all at rest!” for rest alone becometh The soul that casts on Him its every care; “Be all at rest!” so shall thy life proclaim Him A God who worketh and who heareth prayer.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: “Be all at rest!” so shalt thou be an answer To those who question, “Who is God, and where?” For God is rest, and where He dwells is stillness, And they who dwell in Him that rest shall share.
